posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase PSA 1/SGC 10 (but very presentable backs!) T-206's.  

I have always wanted to do a run of the different backs.  Just looking for one of each brand, not the different and tougher factory variations.  Looking to buy or trade.  

Here are the backs I am looking for:

American Beauty 350 w/frame
Broad Leaf (350 or 460)
Carolina Brights
Cycle (350 or 460)
Drum
El Principe de Gales
Hindu (brown)
Lenox (black)
Old Mill (Base Ball Subjects or Southern League) (brown)
Piedmont (150, 350, or 350-460)
Polar Bear
Sovereign (150, 350, or 460)
Sweet Caporal (150, 350, or 350-460)
Tolstoi
Uzit

Please give prices when able.  I will cross them off as I go... Thanks!
